name: Ancient Maze (starring Mathilda Ayume)
description:
Mathilda Ayume is a famous explorer, as she scouts the world's hidden treasures alongside her teammate for the last twelve years, Rodolphe Digdurt.

The two of them are now aiming at the treasure of the Ancient Maze, a cave so deadly no explorer ever came back alive from.
However, as Mathilda jumped first inside the cave, Rodolphe closed the entrance on her, explaining it was his masterplan to avenge the fact Mathilda refused to date him when they started working together!

Now, Mathilda is left all alone in the darkness of the Ancient Maze.

Find the treasure to exit the cave!

======================================

Controls:

 - Arrow keys: move around

 - "X" key: Push large boulders (after collecting the "BOOT" power-up)

 - "C" key: Drill through cracked walls (after collecting the "DRILL" power-up)

 - "V" key: Ride on the water (after collecting the "RAFT" power-up)

======================================

Walk on a campire fire (lit or not) to save the progress.
Upon dying, you return to the latest campfire you visited.

Mathilda dies in one hit, unless you find the optionnal "HEART" power-up.
A final optionnal power-up is the "TORCH" power-up, that allows you to see a bit further away around you.

======================================

Game made by Linky439 for Ludum Dare 48.

Graphics, code, game design, audio by Linky439.

Fonts: "Press Start 2P" by Codeman38 and "Alkhemikal" by jeti
